name: 280 Zzzap
summary: The game is a simple black and white monochrome driving game. You control a car through a night time scene, and the road is represented by simple posts at the edges. The top of the screen will display information about upcoming curves (like the maximum safe speed to take them at), while the bottom of the screen has a speedometer, timer, scoreboard, and may also display a few tips as well. Just drive, and don't crash. Pay attention to your speed on the corners to avoid crashing.

name: 28 Waves Later
summary: 28 Waves Later - Try to survive when there's a swarm of monsters coming at you! Zombies won't let you rest even for a minute. Imagine you're in a closed space and zombies are closing in on you.

name: 280 Zzzap/Dodgem 2001
summary: The title was named after the US advertising campaign for the Datsun 280Z. Players can drive up to 200 miles per hour (320 km/h) while navigating a tricky road course at night. Players must watch out for treacherous turns, nasty competitors, and the ever-present time limit. It is one of the earliest games, if not the earliest, with authorized branding.

name: 28 Pixels Later
summary:
In this short parody survival horror game, you'll solve puzzles, smoke plants to restore health, and, of course, blow zombies to pieces with a good old shotgun.

You will have to do all this in second person (from the eyes of the zombies you are killing)

name: 28 Babes Later
summary: Play as a determined survivor navigating a zombie-infested world to rescue your 28 girlfriends. Armed with love and an arsenal of weapons, you must battle hordes of the undead. Will your love conquer the apocalypse?

The vocal who disappeared before the festival appeared in front of my eyes 10 years later?!"28" is a slice-of-life variety rhythm game that takes place in the band of Soun Girls' High School.Cute characters + The joy of hitting the beat + Immersive scenarios, Let's enjoy them now!

name: 286 Miles
summary: Denial code 286 is used when the appeal time limits for a claim have not been met. This means that the healthcare provider or the billing entity did not submit an appeal within the specified timeframe after receiving a denial for a claim. As a result, the claim is denied based on the failure to meet the required appeal deadline.

name: 28 Days Later: the game
summary: Fan recreation of danny boyle horror movie

name: 28 Days Train Wreck Survivor
summary:
Stranded after a brutal train crash, your survival begins now.

You wake amidst twisted metal and shattered carriages, trapped between steep cliffs and a vast lake. With only your wits and determination, you must explore, gather, and fight to stay alive for 28 days â€” until rescue arrives.

Every decision counts. Every resource matters. Will you endure?
